thread.title: Watch Adele Open the Grammys With the Performance of a Lifetime
thread.title_full: Watch Adele Open the Grammys With the Performance of a Lifetime

author: Maggie Pehanick
title: Watch Adele Open the Grammys With the Performance of a Lifetime
text:
Adele Performance Video at the 2017 Grammys Watch Adele Open the Grammys With the Performance of a Lifetime February 12, 2017 by Maggie Pehanick 180 Shares 
Leave it to Adele to open music's biggest night with a bang. The singer opted to sing "Hello," off her Grammy-nominated album 25 , and hot damn she really came to win — you hear that, Beyoncé? Last year her "All I Ask" performance had major technical difficulties, so let's just count our lucky stars that this went off without a hitch!
